title: ApcSensors
description: Raw-data from door-sensor for later evaluation.

traceId.description: A unique identifier to be able to trace this message. Also used to detect duplicate messages received.

doorRef.description: Stable alfa-numeric reference that is unique within scope of vehicle (vehicle element/train set). Could be a door-number or a combination of coach number and door number.

alightingCount.description: Accumulated number of alighting passengers detected by this sensor since last reset.

boardingCount.description: Accumulated number of boarding passengers detected by this sensor since last reset.

atDateTime.description: ISO 8601. Reflects the current UTC time.

messageNumber.description: Optional. Sequence number, increased by one for each new message. Used to validate consistency in the data stream.

categoryActivities.description: A list describing APC activity at each individual door divided per handled object category.

categoryRef.description: Object class reference. Possible values given in examples.

alightingCount.description: Accumulated number of alighting of this category detected by this sensor since last reset.

boardingCount.description: Accumulated number of boarding of this category detected by this sensor since last reset.
